query: What is the weather forecast for Beijing? (coordinates: 39.9042°N, 116.4074°E)

### Summary:
- The week starts with some rain on November 7 (4.5 mm precipitation) but remains mostly dry for the rest of the week.
- Temperatures will range between 4.2°C (lowest) and 14.7°C (highest), with mild and cool weather overall.
- Wind speeds will vary, with a peak of 14.5 km/h on November 9, indicating a breezy day.

Make sure to carry an umbrella on November 7 and dress warmly during the mornings and evenings, as temperatures can drop to single digits. Enjoy your time in Beijing!
